articles.title: The Industry That Fights Bed Bugs Is Growing, But The Only Real Winners Are The Pests Themselves
articles.description: Bed bugs are back from the brink of extinction, and increasingly resistant bed bugs mean it's unlikely they can be wiped off the face of the earth again. How can we keep them at bay?
